name: df-ltrn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cltrn, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(clh, cv(s0)), crab(s2, cfv(cfv(cldil, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wral(s3, cfv(catm, cv(s0)), wral(s4, cfv(catm, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s3), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wn(wbr(cv(s4), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s3), cfv(cjn, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3))), cfv(cmee, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), co(co(cv(s4), cfv(cjn, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))), cfv(cmee, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ LTrn =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(LHyp ` s0)‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà((LDil ` s0)` s1)| ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà(Atoms ` s0), ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(Atoms ` s0),((¬¨ s3[(le ` s0)]s1 ‚àß ¬¨ s4[(le ` s0)]s1)‚Üí((s3[(join ` s0)](s2 ` s3))[(meet ` s0)]s1)=((s4[(join ` s0)](s2 ` s4))[(meet ` s0)]s1))))}))
comment: Define set of all lattice translations. Similar to definition of translation in [Crawley] p. 111. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2012.)
